document.full_text: it's 8 p.m. at sao paulo's sublimely overcrowded international airport and marvin curie, seeing all the chairs around him taken, decides to join dozens of other business travelers and sit on the floor.
document.title: special report: brazil's olympic push isn't winning any medals
lines_and_colors: it's 8 p.m. at sao paulo's sublimely overcrowded international airport and marvin curie, seeing all the chairs around him taken, decides to join dozens of other business travelers and sit on the floor.
